page.title: 19WASTE PAPER RE-CYCLING
page.content: In recent years there has been much concern over the{destruction of the {World's forests}in order to produce paper. In order to help to conserve the forests much emphasis has been placed on{re-cycling}as much paper as possible. Companies have been set up to collect waste paper from industry, commerce and local authorities, sort it, compress it and sell it to paper manufacturers to use in the production of new paper. One such company is situated on Hartlebury Trading Estate, in Square Three of the block.
